stlib.interfaces.features

Interface MovableSpatial

  • Type Parameters:
    T - - specifies the spatial type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MovableCycleIF, MovableFaceIF, MovableSegmentIF, MovingPointIF, MovingRegionIF, UnitPointIF, UnitRegionIF
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovableCycle, MovableFace, MovableSegment, MovingPoint, MovingRegion, UnitPointConst, UnitPointLinear, UnitRegionConst, UnitRegionLinear

    public interface MovableSpatial
    Interface that should be provided by movable spatial objects
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RectangleIF getProjectionBoundingBox()
      Method to get the bounding box of the spatial projection of the spatial object

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectionBoundingBox

        RectangleIF getProjectionBoundingBox()
        Method to get the bounding box of the spatial projection of the spatial object
        Returns:
        the projectionBoundingBox, a 'Rectangle' object
